availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John James McClintock (Harrison County, Ky, farmer and clerk)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer and clerk. Kentucky native. Farmer in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860. Deputy clerk in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 1, p. 66B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 623.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, Cynthiana, p. 154B.
"John James McClintock (1826-1892)," Find A Grave, Memorial 146875903, accessed February 11, 2020, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/146875903.
KYR-0001-004-0300.
